description:
this method should be removed from powervm compute driver

--- a/nova/virt/powervm/driver.py
+++ b/nova/virt/powervm/driver.py
@@ -101,13 +101,13 @@
     def list_instances(self):
         return self._powervm.list_instances()
 
-    def list_instances_detail(self):
-        """Return a list of InstanceInfo for all registered VMs"""
-        infos = []
-        for instance_name in self.list_instances():
-            state = self._powervm.get_info(instance_name)['state']
-            infos.append(driver.InstanceInfo(instance_name, state))
-        return infos

Method is not presently found in virt.driver and is using InstanceInfo object which is also gone. 

Leaving this method will not have any effect since it is not call any more, but we should try to cleanup
title: PowerVM compute driver still using virt.driver.InstanceInfo

comments.content:
this method should be removed from powervm compute driver

--- a/nova/virt/powervm/driver.py
+++ b/nova/virt/powervm/driver.py
@@ -101,13 +101,13 @@
     def list_instances(self):
         return self._powervm.list_instances()
 
-    def list_instances_detail(self):
-        """Return a list of InstanceInfo for all registered VMs"""
-        infos = []
-        for instance_name in self.list_instances():
-            state = self._powervm.get_info(instance_name)['state']
-            infos.append(driver.InstanceInfo(instance_name, state))
-        return infos

Method is not presently found in virt.driver and is using InstanceInfo object which is also gone. 

Leaving this method will not have any effect since it is not call any more, but we should try to cleanup
